DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine overall hematologic response rate amifostine patient advance myelodysplastic syndrome . II . Determine toxic effect amifostine patient . OUTLINE : This open label study . Patients receive intravenous amifostine 15 minute three time week . Patients fail respond 8 week undergo dose escalation . Nonresponding patient remove study 12 week . Therapy continue six month respond patient . Patients observe duration response upon therapy discontinuation . Patients relapse therapy resume previous dose . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 36 patient accrue .
